traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Darien can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet

traits.name: Eldritch Mind
entries: Darien has advantage on Constitution saving throws that she makes to maintain {@status concentration} on a spell.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Darien makes two attacks with her War Pick.

actions.name: War Pick
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. 10 (1d8 + 6 damage) piercing damage plus 4 necrotic damage.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast
entries: Ranged atk +8 to hit, range 300 ft., three targets. 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Create Thrall
entries: Darien touches an {@condition incapacitated} humanoid. That creature is then {@condition charmed} by her until a {@spell remove curse} spell is cast on it, the {@condition charmed} condition is removed from it, or she uses this feature again. Darien can communicate telepathically with the {@condition charmed} creature as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence.

actions.name: Summon War Pick
entries: Darien creates a magical war pick in her empty hand. The war pick counts as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage. The war pick has a +1 bonus to attack and damage (already factored into Darien's attacks).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Darien's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. She can innately cast the following spells (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks), requiring no material components:
